special_text:
[i]“We fought. We lost. We died. And now, seeing you all alive, I didn't think it would hurt so much.”
–Kate Pryde[/i]
Mill five cards.
Return up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.
Exile Days of Future Past. When you do, take an extra turn after this one.
